text: My wife and I would rather go without shrimp than go somewhere else. The shrimp are individually  frozen so you can take as many as you need instead of thawing  out the whole bag.  Lillie and Freddy are wonderful people. He goes to Florida to net his catch and she drives to florida with a refrigerated  truck to bring them back. We highly  recommend Freddy Stewart Shrimp.

name: David Minto
text:
Stopped by yesterday to buy some shrimp from Mr. & Mrs Stewart, as I understood they would be "fresh off the boat."  There are several things worth mentioning regarding my encounter with the Stewarts.  Firstly, they  are exceptionally kind and welcoming people - very pleasant to speak and do business with.  I purchased their "jumbo" sized shrimp, and was very impressed with not only their actual size, but also the standardization of the the "jumbo" certification.  I have often bought "jumbo" shrimp from other sources and been disappointed to find that while a few jumbo sized shrimp were present, there were also many shrimp that did not meet the size qualifications of "jumbo."  That was not the case with the Stewarts shrimp - "jumbo" actually meant "jumbo" and all the shrimp I've eaten so far have been of the appropriate size.  The most impressive finding regarding the Stewart's shrimp was the taste.  They are incredibly flavorful, with a salty richness that is very noticeable, but still allows the "shrimp" flavor to shine.   Just for fun, I did a side-by-side taste test of the Stewart's shrimp and a closely located competitor.  It was no contest - the Stewart shrimp beat the boots off the competition... A unanimous agreement amongst everyone that took place in the taste test.

I was so impressed by the Stewarts that I called to let them know how much I have enjoyed my experience with them.

For all of these reasons, I don't plan on buying shrimp anywhere else.  I'll be a customer for life.

text: I want to start off by saying I usually love Holston Gases I buy all my welding supply and propane from them. For the most part they have a very good staff.  I was very disappointed with them this morning when I called at 7 a.m. to get some propane delivery before the storm. I was told they was closed because the weather coming in and my name would be added to a list for delivery when they reopen.

name: Nora Anderson
text: We had one of the worst experiences ever with a propane company.  The guy at the desk did not want to fill our tank on on motorhome, when he said he would I understand why he did not want to do it he had no ideal how to fill a tank.  He freaked out and told us there was something wrong, well that is the overfill valve, he didn't know what that was!!  Then he wanted to charge us 2X's what we were quoted, lucky for us the person who stated our original price was there and he had to charge us what was quoted.  I suggest do not let that man ever fill anything!!   Will never go to them again.

name: Thomas Ostrander
text:
In addition to the various industrial gasses they supply. They also have a very nice selection of welding supplies. Everything from flints, to coats, to multi-thousand dollar welders.
As a welding student at Calhoun Community College I really appreciate that the staff know exactly what you're looking for, even if you don't, and will have it for you in seconds. They also have never tried to upsell me on anything or batted an eyelash at me walking in and only buying a $16 pair of gloves.

name: Brooke Van Zee
text: I love this store. They are so knowledgeable about the products. I went in for the first time to see what would help with my fibromyalgia and migraines. They gave me a sample to try in store and then proceeded to explain how each product worked. I love their water soluble. I take a milligram each day and it helps so much. I also love their bath bombs. The bath bombs are great when I'm having such a bad fibromyalgia flare up that I can't sleep. I just take a bath with the lavender bath bomb and within 15-20 minutes I feel so much better and am ready to go to sleep. I just stopped in for my second time to get some more water soluble. They are so nice and make sure you're getting what you need. LOVE LOVE LOVE this place!!!!!

name: Michael Hu
text:
Awesome experience, Neal was so helpful and knowledgeable.  Super pumped they are in the neighborhood now!

Edit: I would change this to 6 stars if that was an option.  To be completely transparent so others with the same issue may try this, I have been dealing with prostate inflammation for about 3 years now.  It hurts, sometimes much worse than others.

Recently, it’s been bad.  Been to Dr’s and they can’t figure it out, they prescribe me this NSAID that has a terrible side effect so I don’t take it (raises the acidity levels in your body and causes terrible effects).

I’ve been skeptical of CBD and it’s “magic”.  But I got desperate looking for relief so I came here to try it.  Total game changer.  To be honest, it didn’t take away the pain I feel emptying my bladder, but I don’t feel any pain otherwise, and that is HUGE (the people that suffer from this know).

So again, thank you thank you thank you!  I am now a complete advocate for CBD and it’s benefits.  For anyone suffering from Prostatitis, CBD will change your life, go see Neal here!

name: Richard Yard
text:
This pharmacy is the best! They will always fill a patient’s prescriptions! Unlike most pharmacies, you can get more than one prescription of the same pain killers by more than one doctor in the same week. Oh, and you can send friends to pick it up for you because they don’t believe in wasting one’s time w ID-ing. FINALLY, there’s a place out here in our beautiful, red, trump and god fearing city of Athens that just gets it, you know? Oh my gosh I haven’t even gotten to the best part about filling w this place...they deliver! Yes, even xanex. right to your door!
This place truly is a gem. They offer creatively overpriced (to some) children’s toys, scarfs, sodas, cigarettes and highly controlled substances at ease! If you’ve been bouncing around w your RXs and are worried about where to go, look no further! Get all of them filled here! Thanks limestone drug!

name: Joshua Southard

But as pharmacies there are none that compare to the treatment of care and polite employees who are there to help you with your meds and talk to you about other things that are good for you. They treat every customer like it's was there family and has the ol country style of hospitality and helpful. 10 stars❗

text: Was given a free sample of a topical CBD oil ointment to use for pain relief. The ointment caused a blistering chemical burn that caused the skin to peel off. I contacted the store to let them know that their ointment caused a chemical burn and I was told that it couldn't have possibly been caused by their product and that it was an allergic reaction. All I wanted was to let them know that their product caused harm so that they could test their sample before giving it out to anyone else. Instead of an apology or even saying they would check it out all I got was accusations that it couldn't possibly have been from their ointment. I should have known better because it was probably never tested or FDA approved but some homemade remedy they are just selling out of the shop. BUYER BEWARE! Don't buy from this store. Buy from only reputable sources!

resp.text: And we did tell you to quit using it because you definitely had an allergy to it. Sweet Jesus I've got to get a one-star review because you're allergic to something that we sell. It just doesn't seem right we were really nice to you even though you were allergic to something we made.

text: Hands down the best snow crab legs we’ve been able to find since moving to Bham in 2012! Sweet, firm and absolutely delicious! name: David Sanders
text: This is the only place I buy seafood now, if you haven’t been, you definitely need to. For quality of product, it literally can’t be beat!  They get everything in fresh, they steam it for you if you want, and their crawfish brine is TO DIE FOR!  They also sell the brine for you to cook on your own at home if you’d rather. They have all the spices to do Cajun right, and the staff couldn’t be more helpful or knowledgeable. Joe is always at the counter and you’ll never meet anyone who knows more about seafood. I can’t rave about this place enough, it’s clean, convenient, and better freshness and quality of seafood in Birmingham, you’ll never find!

name: P F (Passiflora)
text:
Fresh Gulf seafood!
Visited today for the first time. Got fast, friendly service, fresh gulf oysters, ready-to-cook crab cakes. Fish custom filleted in the back while I waited. They even gave me samples of freshly cooked fish and oysters.

name: Stacey Brown
text:
I decided to shop local instead of Whole Foods on hwy 280 in search for whole red snapper. They did have red snapper and was able to prepare it for cooking just as Whole Foods does. Their prices are higher than Whole Foods which wasn't a deal breaker. We purchased 2 whole red snapper at $52.61 and a half of filet of Salmon at $27.13. They politely provided ice for the ride as requested. Before we could get home we started smelling a foul smell from the fish. This has never happened on our ride from Whole Foods which is a farther distance. We are not fish experts by any means- just seafood lovers. Anyone who does fish would know that one of the fish that we were sold was spoiled and should not be eaten. Definitely an owner or employee of a seafood market would know this. I did some research to determine the signs of bad fish (Spoiled fish has an unpleasant, sharp smell of trimethylamine (bad fish) and rot. Eyes of fresh fish are bulging and shiny. Eyes of old fish are cloudy and sunken into the head. Gills and fins of fresh fish are moist).
One of our fish had all of the signs listed (I posted pictures of the two snappers we were sold).
So what was meant for dinner for two is now dinner for one for @ $52.61.
This was my first and last experience at the Hoover Seafood Market.

name: Aaron Jerome
text: This is in my opinion the BEST Pawn Shop in Huntsville. I have been coming to this pawn shop for many years and have bought a lot from them. Their prices are already better than all the other pawn shops around but they will go that extra mile to make sure you have the best deal. They are a smaller pawn shop but don't let that stop you. They have jewelry, tools, electronics, collectibles, audio equipment, instruments, and more. Not only are their prices great they often do sales for their merchandise too. I bought my wife's engagement ring here as my first purchase and when we upgraded it a few years later I got 75% of what I paid for it back which is just fantastic.  The Staff are excellent and friendly. I recommend American Pawn & Jewelry for everyone as they are the BEST!

name: Timothy Bergstrom
text:
Great place with great deals. They have good items for sale. The best is the kind people that work there. It makes all the difference.

Will stop again!

Thank you

name: Mickey Hosch
text:
Friendly, professional, honest and caring.
Knowledgeable.  A delight to do business with.  Other shops way undercut value of particular item.  American Pawn took time to examine and determine true value of my item.
Thank you!!

name: T Hem
text:
American Pawn is truly one terrific place to business.  I have never dealt with more professional and friendly people than the staff!  Truly a tremendous experience!!!

Thanks so much!

Daniel

name: Sherry Clanton
text: Been a customer for over 5 years. Owner & staff are wonderful Christians. I have purchased much jewelry from this business and am always very pleased. Loretta is absolutely amazing! 💥Buy with confidence!💥

name: Barbara Taylor
text: Mrs. Loretta and the crew are very polite, friendly,  generous, and make sure you are satisfy with your purchase. I thank Mrs. Loretta cause as everyone that works at American Pawn put customers first but she knows exactly my likes and dislike which not every jeweler take the time to know their customers likes and dislike. She takes her time with the customers and makes sure he or she are satisfy. I been going to American pawn since they open and will continue to do so. They deserve more then 5 stars but that all they put on here. I highly recommend American pawn honest people it’s hard to find jewelers this honest 90% just want your money. 100% recommended.

resp.text:
Hi Barbara, thank you so much for the exceptional feedback!
We appreciate you

name: Anthony Stokes
text: I want to thank you Miss Loretta Brown for your courteous kind thoughtful and knowledgeable service I have experience when I was there.  And your ability to address successfully my questions and concerns thank you! keep up the good work.

name: Althea N. Hinson
text: My experience was BEYOND anything I could’ve expected! They had EXACTLY what I was in search for, at an AMAZING price. The excellent customer service and personable employees were just a bonus. Really feels like family when you shop with them. My son and I thank you!!

name: Georgene K Wigen
text: At American Pawn &Jewelry I am treated like family.  Never have I been made to feel less using their services. Mandie, Mr. W, Mike, Loretta and the rest of the group are kind and considerate people who will go above and beyond to help you out. I highly recommend American Pawn & Jewelry.

name: Megan Turner
text: Staff is great to work with.  Very friendly and outgoing.  THey are willing to work with you.  I have worked with them for a long time and would highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Roderick Smith
text: I love coming here. They always been great to me. I been coming here for years. They have great prices and they sell u great quality stuff

name: Kinz Payne
text: Mike was one of the best employees! He was very helpful! I will definitely do business here again!

name: Vanessa Creamer
text: I have never been treated so well in this type of  establishment. They were extremely friendly and gave me a little more than what I was hoping for. This is a go to place for this type of business. 🥰

name: Never Again
text: They help us most of the time when we need it. We have been loyal customers for awhile now and they look out for us as much as possible. Definitely recommend their service to anyone.

name: lee austell
text: Love this place, they help when your in need the most. They have fair rates that help you pay off your pawn, so you can get you items back. They've helped me out several times in a crunch.  I would highly recommend them .

name: Deborah Brown
text: I love American pawn. Their the most honest, friendly, best prices in Huntsville Alabama area. Thanks To The Owner and his people.

resp.text: Thank you, Deborah! We greatly appreciate you & look forward to seeing you again soon

name: Julie Hill
text: Great place wonderful service I always come to look /shop for jewelry, everyone is so great  never pushy or impatient .

name: J Allen
text: Best place to go in Huntsville! Great Employees and products. You should leave there Happy!!

name: Clarence Anderson
text: They’ve always been there for me when I’ve needed them! Great people. Great service. Great place!

name: Charlotte Lemay
text: Courteous staff. Good prices. Great jewelry and merchandise. Best place to sell gold and silver. I checked several places. This place gave me much more for my jewelry.  Convenient area. Parking good.

resp.text:
Hi Charlotte,
Thank you for leaving us a good review.
We are so glad to hear from you and that you had a good experience here.
Your business is very much appreciated and we look forward to hearing from you again

name: Jonathan Spencer
text: Wonderful service and great Staff they really made me feel like I was family. They really do business the old fashion way with respect and passion I will definitely keep doing business with them!!!!!!

resp.text: Hey Jonathan, thanks so much for the awesome review! We'll be sure to keep up the good work

name: Tamara McNealey
text: Mrs. Loretta Brown was very helpful in my decision on picking out the best watches for my children. It was a pleasure to have someone wait on you with such a sweet spirit

name: Mario Maitland
text: Best pawn shop staff I’ve met! Great service and great selection!

name: Frederick Jones
text: Very kind and friendly service!! Great prices that you cannot beat, I love this place and you will too...

name: Darlene Baylor
text: I have been in the store and I love looking at the jewelry and you have awesome customer service, especially Mrs Brown she is awesome

name: RaAunna Caldwell

resp.text:
Thank you for the good review, RaAunna.
So glad to hear that you are happy with our service.
We do appreciate your business & look forward to serving you again in the future.

name: Amber Sarkisian
text: American Pawn is by far our favorite pawn shop! All of the employees are super helpful and pleasant. I highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us an awesome review!

name: Kelyn Vital
text: The people here are awesome and very friendly I enjoy visiting the place and they always have great deals

name: Tim Gallagher
text: Friendly store staff. But Pitiful Business ethics. Made a price for a set of tools and said they would charge battery and I could come back later to verify they work; when I came back they refused to sell the item to me and tried to increase the price by $185.

name: Mark Jones
text: If you need a nice watch or any piece of fine jewelry go see Ms. Loretta wonderful staff and pricing been a customer for over 15 yrs

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us some great feedback! We look forward to serving you for many more years

name: Hastie's Repair Channel
text: Love this place! Always gives you the most money they can on a pawn. If it had 10 🌟 s I would give 10 🌟 s.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome feedback :)

name: heidi mauthe
text: I have used American Pawn on two occasions now for a loan.I always leave very happy about the service and professionalism from "everyone"there.I highly recomend them!

name: Terry Heaton
text: I drove all the way to this shop based entirely on reviews. That was a mistake, and I won't do that again. Clearly, the other reviews are just plants. Bad experience. It's not just that they didn't want what I was selling; it's more about the fact that I had to deal with a lackey and that nobody even looked at what I had for sale. All they heard was "Christmas Ornaments" and made their decision from that. How ignorant.

resp.text: Hi Terry, I'm sorry to hear that you feel that way. If you ever have any questions about seasonal items or items we can accept, please feel free to give us a call at (256) 852-1776. We do appreciate you & hope we can help serve you in the future.

name: Missy Pickle
text: Wonderful merchandise as well as helpful employees!  I would definitely shop here again!

resp.text: Hi Missy, thank you for leaving us an awesome review!

name: Matt Smith
text: They tend to cater towards jewelry,tools,and electronics but they have a decent sized music shop as well. Great service even if you can't strike a deal with them you'll be treated with respect and you'll be helped almost the second you walk in the door!!!!! Depending on the time of day this location can be difficult to enter and exit due to traffic but well worth the deals once you're inside!

resp.text:
Hi Matt,
Thanks for the review!
We're very grateful for your business & really appreciate your honest opinion of our business. We strive to offer 5-star service, and will keep trying to get there.
If there is any way that we can assist you better, just give us a call & let us know what else we can do to make your experience better.
Have a great day!

name: Natalie Pack
text: Great store and people. No judgy looks and have always been there for me.

resp.text: Hey Natelie, thanks for leaving us the great feedback! We appreciate you

name: Twila Ellis
text: Very friendly people. Reasonable. Honest.

Hi Taylor,
Thank you for leaving us an awesome review!
We're so glad to hear that you had a great experience here.

Best Pawn Shop in Huntsville, hands down. A+ customer service...
thankyou guys

name: henry smith
text: They are the best I give them a five star

text: The staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable and their selection and prices are out of this world!!

resp.text: Thank you Amy! We appreciate your business and the awesome review :)

name: Personal Gmail Acct Alabama
text: I love this place, great guys no pressure and real straight shooters when you are trying to pawn as well. I greatly prefer being told " we just aren't selling a lot of these " to having an insult price thrown at me like other places will do. The do free FFL transfers for Vets and owner is a Vet as well so he makes extra sure to take good care of military.  Selection is the job highlight. Lots of variety from vintage and unique to the newest MSR equipment. They have a good sense of what to keep around as well which let's them make the most out of a smaller shop. Generators, TV's, a few Instruments and Amps, Tools etc., Jewelry/ watch cabinet, and an expertly stocked gun rack.

name: Monsherrye Lash
text: Quick and simple! Needed a Temporary fix they took care of me!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review, Monsherrye! We appreciate your business.

name: super savage25
text: I love coming  to this pawn shop it's family friend

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great feedback! We appreciate your support

name: Jay Ryan
text: Friendly staff, always professional, and undoubtedly the best selection in all of Huntsville! Love this pawn shop and Mrs. Brown, they make it hard for me to leave!

name: Aaliyah Roberts

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review, Aaliyah! We are so happy to hear that you are pleased with our service & we look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Ann Price
text: The tech cleaned up my vacuum and put belt on great service

name: Ginger L
text: The lady that has been there for years  (I think her name is Alethea) is awesome!  You can ask her just about anything and she knows it all. She represents what customer service should be and the repair folks are top notch as well...plus my vacuum is the best vacuum I have ever owned (the extra $$ is worth it folks!) and I will continue buying from them for those reasons.

name: sam “The Man with the Plan”
text: Hey folks, fake reviews, I'm real, and here to tell it like it is, how in the world is somebody supposed to buy a piece of plastic, for 1200.00 dollars? I mean these things are junk it's a cheap motor, in a plastic box, with a tube attached to a plastic handle? When it breaks, they try to get you to trade it in for a new one??? It's a con, just over the top, a scam, and they are belligerent, when you need something, hey it's unreal, I'm a working person, not a rich stay at home mom, you get the same thing with a 50 Buck vacuum, waste of money.

name: Zeke H
text: Excellent service and staff.

name: Amy Sommers
text: Helpful and friendly

name: Madison Skinner
text: Absolutely love how they turned out!! Service was super quick and the employees were very nice!

name: Celine Clark
text: I absolutely love it here! The service is amazing and every nail tech is very attentive to what every person needs. They make you feel valued and it is overall a great experience. Best place to get taken care of.

name: Angel Neal
text: I will never spend another red cent of my money with this establishment. A great lack of professionalism. A lack of communication and instead of resolving an issue with a customer he’d rather smoke a cigarette. I’ve been coming here for years and am so ashamed of the way myself and my daughter were treated today. Tomorrow I will be calling the BBB.

name: Bobbie Daniel
text: Stopped by to browse & the lady in the office was very nice & showed me what I was thinking of buying. It was allot more spacious than I'd imagined & financing is reasonable so will definitely consider a purchase in the near future.

resp.text: Thank you

name: D Hofstadter
text: We had a 8 x 12 storage unit for years. Not we have a much larger building in the back yard that matches our house and we own it! so... Over all we are very excited and pleased with 10k Barns. If we had to do it over again we would still use 10K Barns. Quality build, delivery, setup, level, and friendly. So Yea, we are very pleased!

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Ron Furgason
text: We've ordered 2 of these buildings for each of our rental properties. Very very impressed with the workmanship as well as the overall aesthetics. We will be using 10k for our next property storage building.

name: John Ryan
text: Its alot bigger than we thought!! We love it!

resp.text: Thank you for the stars John. Hope you enjoy your new Man Cave! o.O

name: LinEvBlaine
text: Best prices, selection, setup!!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate you!

name: Alyssa Barber
text: I love this boutique! Always up to date with what’s trending while also offering faith inspired tees. Mrs. Lee is always so helpful and welcoming

name: Cee Cee Broughton
text: Extremely nice Lady that helped me with a few shirts.  God inspired store that treats their clients  with respect and gratitude.  Excellent prices and always has fun sales.   T shirts are great gifts.

name: Katrina Blaylock
text: Cute little store with inspirational clothing and jewelry!

name: Shannon Malloy
text: This is such a cute store. Lee was so warm and welcoming! A+ attitude. Super cute shirts for $5 and they have wonderful faith based stuff! Looking forward to going back again!

name: Sung Hong
text: Not sure if they're worth the 2 stars, because their service is just terrible.  Ordered on Dec. 3 thinking it would be ample time to get my order in by Christmas.  Didn't happen.  Came Dec. 26th which is fine, it'll still work, but two items of my order were missing.  Good luck on calling 'cause no one ever answers and out of the emails I sent, only one reply saying that all orders are backed up.  Tried reaching out to them about the 2 items missing and no on ever replies or calls back.  Terrible customer service, terrible shipping time ... don't bother.  I'm not the one to normally leave bad reviews, but for those planning to order off their website, good luck.  I really thought their products were nice online, but it's a shame that whoever runs this business doesn't know how.  If someone else knew how to run this place, I'm sure it'd do real well.  I'm sure their repeat customers are low especially if a lot are having this kind of first time buyer experience.

name: Kelly Ray
text: I am so happy with my purchases from Crazy Cool Threads! The shirts are amazing and wear so well! They are super soft! I have many of the designs and Can’t wait to get more! Everyone is always so friendly and nice! Plus they now have a boutique to shop local from! Everyone there is so friendly.

name: Chelsea Adams
text: Y’all their bag deals are awesome! You can get a bag from them(2 sizes) and fit as many of the sale shirts and you can into that bag and they are either $30 or $45! First time I did it was at the most recent girls night out and I got stuff for me and my husband. I went the other day to look for something and did it again and think I got a totally of 14 shirts and that was in the small bag!

name: Sherry Delozier
text: Ordered a shirt Dec. 4 and received my package on Dec. 22, so I am happy I was able to give it as a Christmas gift.  The shirt was  good quality and the color I expected, the only reason I didn't rate with 5 stars was the concern that I might not have received it in time for the holiday's. Just a suggestion for future reference for customers is to put a disclaimer next to 5-7 business days shipping statement is that during busy times, shipping may take a little longer.

name: Anna kate Blackwell
text: I love my Crazy Cool shirts. I have many different ones and always look forward to ordering from them. They are so great to work with if I ever have a question. 10/10 would recommend!!

name: Dixie Degelow
text: I ordered my item 3 weeks ago, and the website said it should only take 3-5 business days to be completed and shipped. I called customer service and I was not treated professionally at all. The woman on the phone was laughing while talking to another employee? And she proceeded to tell me that it hadn’t shipped because it was fall break and not many employees are working. I love the brand and want to support all Christian stores but they shouldn’t guarantee shipping to take 3-5 days if it isn’t true. GREAT product but makes sure you order weeks in advance if it’s for a gift.

name: Saturn Solace
text: As a black women I felt extremely uncomfortable shopping here they followed me around the store and the store owner was extremely disrespectful and rude to me even though this is suppose to be a “Christian store”. I came to look for cute sweaters and left reminded that racism and discrimination are still strong here in Enterprise. I will never shop here again nor will I ever recommend anyone to shop here. If I could give this store 0 stars I would in a heartbeat. Pleas don’t support this store.

name: Elizabeth Armstrong
text:
This place has beautiful shirts. We left with 3 of them and a decal! They are a bit pricer for a shirt but they are made beautifully.
The only downfall was the customer service. No one greeted us when we walked in, they just looked at us. After asking a question a young lady helped us but went right back after. When trying to make small talk at the check out she kinda cut it short and didn’t seem to care about a single thing I said, she wouldn’t even make eye contact. Left me feeling kinda sad. Kind of a bummer when you’re buying Godly shirts in a Christian store. Overall the actual items are beautiful and worth the price. Just need to work on their customer service skills.

name: Amber Merklinger
text:
EDIT: They explained to me what happened with my order and why it arrived the way it did. They responded quickly and refunded my money, so that was nice of them! I love the way their designs look online, so I'm hoping to give them another shot in the future.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ORIGINAL REVIEW: Their shirts are cheaply made and not worth the money. I ordered a shirt from their company and when the shirt arrived, I was disappointed. The words on the shirt are super faded and are not white and clean like in the photos. The shirt color is darker and more muted than in the images. It looks cheaply made and the material is not soft. I was so excited for this shirt, but I put it back in the bag because I was so disappointed.

name: Gremlin King
text: Good selection of clothes and very friendly staff clothes here. Definitely recommend shopping here.

name: tcboykin
text: Outstanding!! Fast and excellent service, the softest shirts imaginable were at my house before I could even believe it! And the Faith based sayings on the shirts were just straight from my heart! Cannot find anything I don't like about my first experience with this company.

name: Heather Ormsby
text: The staff was very nice.  The clothing was on trend and moderately priced but very few options for plus sizes.

name: Susan Wood
text: Very nice store & employees also very nice.Would highly recommend.

name: Kimberly Middleton
text: Shirt is kinda thin but very nice. I was sceptical to order due to the bad reviews but I personally have had a good first experience.  Will order again.

name: Meg The Peg
text: They sent an email and said my order was delivered. It arrived 3 days later. With the wrong shirt. I don’t think it’s even worth returning it because I’m sure they’d find another way to screw it up.

name: Rachel Macias
text: Wearing my faith never looked so good 😁 comfy and stylish- perfect for me. Love them! ❤

name: Linda Younglove
text:
I placed an order on March 4th for 3 tee shirts.  Soooo excited to receive them.  They took the money from my debit account immediately, received an email that they would ship 3 - 5 days.  It is now March 18th and after 3 phone calls and 3 emails have heard NOTHING!!!  I see from other comments that their customer service is very poor and they obviously don't care enough about that to make the needed changes.  I was so excited to find a great christian tee shirt company and was sure they'd have the integrity to operate with high standards.  I really hope the $75 I spent isn't down the drain.  I hope they do the right thing by me and other customers.  These people are your customers and deserve your respect.  I just wish I would have read these comments prior to ordering.  One star is really too much but since I couldn't post without something, I am giving you one star.

edit-I did receive an email a couple of hours after this review stating that they were working on my order and offered a 20% discount.  But I don't think I will use that until I see how long it takes me to get my order and IF I get it.

name: Caitlyn Myers
text: I ordered two grab bags as Christmas gifts for my mom and sister on a November 23rd. It is now December 9th, I’ve emailed the company 3 times and messaged them on Instagram once and I still have NOT received any information about when they will be shipping and my debit card has been CHARGED. I’ve ordered from them once before and I was sent the wrong size. I wanted to give it another shot, so that’s why I went ahead and ordered the grab bags. I will not ever shop from here again or refer anyone to the website. I have received zero shirts and I’m out my money.

name: Sparklin Treasures
text: I am really disappointed with our order from this company!  They had a special after Thanksgiving of two shirts of their choice for $15, and they showed lots of beautiful colored shirts with fancy script of sayings and scriptures.  We ordered two sets, one for each daughter.  We specified in the special instruction box that they were for two girls in the same house and so please send two different bags and please not white (they don't do well with white)- even though they showed all colored shirts, we just wanted to make sure. Almost a month later, we received four very plain shirts crammed together in one bag- TWO WHITE AND TWO NAVY OF THE SAME EXACT SHIRTS!!!! We even called ahead and asked them to make sure they were different.  It is just dishonest to show pretty colored shirts with fancy script as the shirts we would be getting and then send identical white and navy shirts with super plain and boring block type.  And a supposedly "Christian" company.

name: Chrissy Stewart
text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS COMPANY THEY WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY AND RUN!! THEY DONT ANSWER PHONES THEY DONT RETURN PHONE CALLS THEY DONT SEND YOU YOUR PRODUCT!!

name: Missy Widra
text: This is really hard because I purchased 3 T shirts for Christmas gifts back on November 23. Was told 3-5 business days. I understand it’s the holidays but when you send an email 14 days later stating no package, call 3 different times leaving voicemails and no response this is just disheartening and quite frankly unprofessional. I have worked retail most of my life for some pretty high profile companies and I would never treat a customer with this kind of unprofessionalism. I will never purchase another product from this company which makes me sad because I really wanted to support small business and a Christian company too. So very disappointed.

name: Kelley Marsh / Taylor Brooks
text: I love this brand's shirts and everything they stand for. Highly recommend purchasing from their website!

name: ash black
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this company, what they stand for, and their shirts are INCREDIBLE. They feel awesome & customer service ROCKS

name: Sarah Nunya
text: Tried for 5 months to get a response to their sponsored ads. (IG)  I needed to know if they had a size chart. They never answered one of my messages. But the sponsored ads kept popping up. So I asked publicly if they could receive messages. I got several responses to my comment from individuals saying, “Good luck. They’ve never answered mine.” And “I just had to open a paypal case against them, cause I placed an order and never got it.” CCT finally answered my comment by saying that they were having difficulty getting their messages. Then each one of us that had made a “negative” comment, CCT has blocked. Pretty sad that a so called Christian business would treat people this way. I had lots of shirts I wanted to order from them too. I’ll give my money to someone else who can design me something very similar, but not exact,  to what CCT has.

name: Tina
text: Just received my shirt.  It's thin and not quite as attractive as the photo.  I love the message on it but the quality is just average.

name: M Lew
text: I am very disappointed with Crazy cool threads.  I ordered the Be still & Know and that  tshirt came as the website had stated 3-5 days.  Was excited with that purchase, so I ordered another tshirt that was on sale and that tshirt who know where it is.  I've left a few emails and not sure where the disconnect is and no one is answering the phones.   Just a little irritated with the company. text: Very disappointed in overall customer service. I placed an order on Dec 13th for two tshirts(in stock) according to the website. On Dec 14th, the funds posted my account. On Dec 22nd,  I had not received any communication regarding my order. I emailed and received a "standard" return email indicating all orders would be processed and should be received by Dec 24th. As of Dec 24th, no tshirts, no communication. I emailed and again received a "standard" return email indicating they were closed until Dec 27th. I called and left a message as well as another email. I received a phone message on Dec 27th, indicating the two tshirts I ordered were popular and were on back order. Yet, according to the website all items were in stock. The message also indicated the order would be shipped the following day(Dec 28th). As of Jan 2nd, I still have not received my order. I did receive an email indicating that one tshirt shipped today! However, the phone message had assured me my order was going to ship on Dec 28th and did not. I am disappointed with the "standard" email responses, having to leave a message and not receiving a follow up phone call and I will not do business with a company that will post your account prior to shipping your order. My children receive 3 gifts for Christmas. If I had known earlier the shirts were "back ordered" I would have purchased something else.

It’s SOO sad when trying to support small christian companies and I get absolutely no customer support. The most frustrating part is, I continue to receive promo emails when they’ve yet to send my first order. At this point all I want is a refund.

text: Went into this store today looking for two things: a pillow and to possibly re-do the curtains in my home. I had heard that they do custom curtains and I was excited to see their selection. When I followed up with saying that I was having a hard time finding some curtains for my home that I liked (AKA I would like to look at some options) her response was "oh really". And then nothing further was offered. My assumption when someone is running a business that specializes in custom curtains and decor is to help an interested customer no matter what. I may look young and may not have been dressed in my Sunday's best, but money was no issue when it came to getting what I wanted. I was fully prepared to replace all of the curtains in my home. I will go elsewhere.

resp.text:
Thanks for the feedback, Marco. I think you may have gone to a different store and sadly not Simply CBD. We don't have outsourced products nor pseudo marijuana, however, if you do make your way to Simply CBD , we'd love to meet you. We encourage our clients that have a great experience to leave reviews so others may experience the success that so many have had.

Update: Google has confirmed this review was made by the IP address belonging to John Mcaruther of Fairhope Hemp. This is the 5th attempt that Fairhope Hemp has made to leave negative reviews. Google has removed the others. I asked that this one stays so others may read. We wish you the best, John

Joined a weekly game here for several months with my son and had a lot of fun. Got to know the owners, the staff and many of the regulars. We definitely felt like part of the family. They have gaming tables set up in the back and even a private table/room for ‘guild members’. Last year, our weekly game fell on Halloween night.. everybody dressed up and they had it catered. The new location in Calera is next door to a gaming themed coffee shop(!), and I believe ROE has a small (limited) bar in house now? Pretty cool for a gaming shop.

We were fairly new to tabletop gaming, but the owners and the rest welcomed us and helped us fit right in. All in all, easily one of the best spots around greater Bham for tabletop gaming. Go check it out. Have fun!

name: Kyle Crider
text: I am sharing this in hopes that those who feel as I do won't waste a trip. I had been planning to visit ROE for quite a while (I do not live in Calera) and was looking forward to visiting both their bar and game store. According to Google Maps, ROE identifies itself as Black-owned, veteran-led, and women-led; three things I would normally go out of my way to support. However, the following sign greeted me upon arrival, prominently featured in ROE's store-front window: "Guns are welcome on premises. Please keep all weapons holstered unless need arises. In such cases, judicious marksmanship is appreciated." So despite making a special trip to Calera specifically to visit ROE, I turned around and never plan to visit so long as this ridiculous and dangerous policy remains in place. As a university professor, I believe in evidence-based reasoning, and data shows that the "good guy with a gun myth" is just that -- a myth. I prefer to keep my tavern interactions with folks armed with deadly weapons to the realm of fantasy, where they belong; NOT my not-so-local hobby shop.

resp.text: As the owner, I would like to say I am sorry that you felt that way about our store without speaking with us about it.  My husband is a combat arms vet and I am military raised, and so we have a slightly different humor.  I agree that our store is not for everyone, just like not every shop is for us.  That being said, spending any time in our store with our regulars would show that while we allow carry (and only a small amount actually carry), misbehavior with such items is NOT TOLERATED.  We have found that those that stay with us, stay because they feel welcomed and accepted for who they are without judgement; and we have ALL types here.  No one here gets away with bullying or criticizing others for their various believes as long as said believes bring no harm to self or others.  We consciously monitor the behavior and body language of everyone that visits as should be done no matter the type of shop.  Once again, I am sorry you felt your trip a waste of time, and hope that you do find a shop where you feel comfortable and happy, because end the end, that is what is important.

name: Levi Westbrook
text:
Wow, what a fantastic little shop. Could be a museum! Great trinkets and large items cover every square inch of this place.

Even the bathroom is decked out with antiques from floor to ceiling.

The owner is one of the nicest people I've had the pleasure of meeting. I visited this place with my little sister and fiancé and unwittingly won a contest! The shop owner graciously let us choose a candle from her cupboard with almost 2 dozen different scents. Very much appreciated and a nice surprise!

I'm not big on antique shops, but if you're in Athens or travelling through Alabama looking for little antique stores, don't pass this one up!!! Many treasures here.

I bought an Art Carpet Bastille Collection Faded Beauty woven oval area rug in gray/blue and it was on sale for about 1/3 the price of online stores and it is so gushy and cozy and the pile is so thick and it just is stunning! I'm so impressed with Suggs. The salesman was very kind when helping us with our search. They really do have beautiful rugs at very reasonable prices. It fits in my space and makes the room look so elegant! It is really luxurious and so I must recommend Suggs Rugs to EVERYONE in Alabama!

text: By the far the best selection in the area of mid-priced rugs--perhaps $200-$1000 for large rugs, and less $$ for smaller ones.  Probably over 1,000 rugs stacked on dozens of tables. text:
If you are looking for good rugs at great prices this is your place. Great selection. A little work bc you have to flip through some piles on the tables, but totally worth it.

We got an 8x11 for our dinning room that was on clearance/factory second that is perfect for $180

We are still working on a living room rugs, but the policy is you can take it within 24 hours for a full refund or a week for exchange. So if you take it home and it does not work, just bring it back. This cam in handy when trying to find the right thing for the living room.

You can tell that that the stock moves quickly, as many of the things we saw one day were not there the next. Nothing fancy about this place, but a great way to get a rug. And Don't forget to throw the ball for Max the dog!

name: Christy Dunaway
text: I see a lot of complaints about this place from people who just don't get it. Automatic washes aren't for detailing your car. They're for quick washes when you don't have time or money for detailing. The wash won't remove 6 months of road grime. It will wash of the dust and dirt so the kids can't write Wash Me with their fingers in the dust. The #1 selling point, imo, is the unlimited vacuum use!! Love those thick microfiber towels, too.

resp.text: Thank you, Christy!  We love the towels too!

name: Jill W
text: We absolutely love this car wash! Me and my fiancée go to it all the time when we need our vehicles washed. My fiancée works in a casting yard and his truck gets caked in concrete/mud mixture. When we come here we get the high dollar wash but it’s worth it! It gets everything off his truck and we even got a membership because we liked them so much. Every time we take our vehicles there we come out looking good!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Definitely prefer this location over the others hands down.

text: Love this store

name: Krissi Harpel
text: All the reviews were great so I was excited to get started with this company.  Their representative came to the house and brought a contractor, I was told it would take about a week to generate an estimate of materials.  During that week I sent some colors I liked and a couple of questions and I was not getting any response from the designer .  Once the week was up I sent an email to the designer and told her I needed someone who was going to be responsive to emails .  She immediately responded saying that she could not get my cabinets to meet our timeline and I would have to find someone else ...which if she had paid attention I had asked for an estimate on painting and replacing .  I then left a message for someone from management. to call me and got no response.  Very very disappointing

resp.text: I spoke with Krissi and explained a few items to her concerning her project and attempted to assist her with her project even though Coastal is not performing the project.  Hopefully this will help.  We do not paint cabinets and recommend under normal conditions that this not be done.  Typically, a paint job will have to repeated in the near term due to underlying issues with cabinets themselves.

name: Hilton Perry
text: For many months my wife and I  have wanted to remodel our bath but finding some one that was knowledgeable and and responsive was impossible and had almost given up. A friend told us to call  Coastal Kitchen & Bath and with in just a few days we were set up to meet and go over what we wanted and measure. The next week we were picking out the flooring, cabinets and fixtures we wanted. Today we have the bath that we had visioned for moths. Very responsive and courteous.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  It can be amazing what a kitchen remodel can do for the appearance of your home and your piece of mind.

name: Chelsie Sotero
text: I have had the pleasure of working with Jill here and she is a delight! This company should be proud to have her as an employee. She is very knowledgeable, helpful and very friendly. I will tell everyone I know to make sure to stop in!!!

resp.text: you're going to love your new mud room

name: me to you
text:
The lady, Jill, was very helpful.  If you go there you have to order what you see on display.  Ordering means a 3 or 4 week delay.  They have a variety of everything related to the bathroom.  My apologies because I did not take photos.

My contractor wants it yesterday. Seems the stuff is never there fast enough for them. They want to go to Lowe's, pick it up, and install it the same day.

resp.text: Thanks for the opportunity.  We do not keep cabinets in stock since there are so many options, sizes and colors.  Unfortunately, contractors can experience delays and then want everything yesterday, like you said.

name: Alla Nikitina
text: Out of business

resp.text: Actually, we are not out of business.  We have a new location that we are working on opening up after the Hurricane Sally destruction to our old building but we have been working from remote locations since Sally.  Our website, Facebook page, Pinterest, Google My Business page, etc. all reflect we are open for business and have been open for business.  Our phone number is active as well so feel free to contact us if you have a project you are interested in us quoting for you.  251-943-5358.

name: ted croft
text: They dont stand behind their products! Bought a marble vanity top and they installed two sinks (undermount) and the silicone bled through to the surface of the top and stained it where the silicone was applied for the sinks. The top is ruined! After sending pics Mike told me to call the manufacturer of the silicone to get it fixed or remedied. What terrible customer service. Good thing he sold the company!

resp.text: Ted is correct, the business has been sold to the owner of Folkers Window Company.  The marble vanity top Ted purchased was a old remnant from the warehouse and was "sold as is" for a very cheap price.  Unfortunately with remnants and very low prices, these things happen.  This was communicated to the customer at the time of the sale.  The best way to avoid issues with products and expired warranties is to purchase new products instead of remnants.

resp.text: Thanks for the business and the review.  No, we are not the cheapest because as you said "good products".  We do not sell junk and we use professional installers and not sub contractors.  In addition, we use stainless steel fasteners, high grade caulks, etc. all which lead to a higher price and a higher quality installation.  Thus, we will typically not be the cheapest...but we're the best.

They treated my junk with exceptional care, performed research to help me set up the suspension, and took a bit of time for bench racing. The owner and two of the mechanics that I spoke with were exceptionally knowledgeable and very willing to help a guy out with suggestions.
Today they were setting up my track car, installing a 6 speed in a restored 67 Chevelle, and replacing the engine in a 1500 Ram. These guys can do it all.

text: We had the best time at my twins’ birthday party! We rented the 24’ Whitewater Falls dual lane slide with Slip N Slide attachment. The owners were wonderful, answered all my questions and kept open communication. No short four hour time frame, either! Fantastic experience and tons of fun.

name: Laura Lott
text: Awesome inflatables and even better owners. We have rented 2 inflatable water slides in the past month and our kids have had a blast. They don't do 6 hour rentals like most company's, you keep it the entire weekend. I cant say enough about how much of an awesome company Spacewalk rentals is.

name: Jessica Sessions
text: Our boys had the best time playing in the Tropical 5-in-1! Space Walk of Montgomery was great to work with! The owners were professional and responded promptly with all communications. The guys who delivered the bouncy house let us know when they were almost here and made sure we had everything we might need to have a great weekend! We will definietly be using Space Walk again!

name: Christy Bridges
text: Had a wonderful experience with space walk of Montgomery. They are professional and courteous. We have used them for last 3 summers and always happy with the slide, delivery and setup. Will use them over and over again

name: David Gates
text: The best inflatable experience that we’ve had.  Heavy duty inflatable and great deal for the multi-day rental.  Prompt delivery and pickup.  We will be using them for all of our inflatable needs.

name: Sarah Campbell
text: We were so please with the HUGE water slide we rented for the weekend. The owners were so nice and accommodating and the slide was in great shape! Thanks for an awesome weekend! We will definitely rent from them again!

name: Heather Baker
text: Spacewalk of Montgomery is the best! Fast, friendly and very organized! We love renting from them and hope to continue to do so for years to come!

name: Candice Marvel
text: So easy and convenient to do business with. They Set up and picked up: our friends and family had a blast!

name: Lauren Esco
text: Rented for my sons 2yr old party! The children had a blast! Definitely recommend and will use them again! They had a great deal when I reserved it (pay 1 day get for 3 days.) GREAT customer service!

name: Luke Brooks
text: Great company to work with. They took extra care to make sure the slide was clean. Delivered on time and we had a blast. Thanks! We’ll book again soon

name: Sloan Family
text: Such a great experience! Everyone we dealt with, over the phone and in person, were so friendly and helpful! Great prices too. We rented the toddler water slide and it was the perfect size and super easy to maneuver! Highly recommend!

name: Citoryia Martin
text: Will definitely rent from them again! Shannon was very helpful in helping me pick out a water slide last minute. We also rented a dunk tank which was a huge hit! Adam delivered the items and he was so nice and helpful and made sure to give us great information on how to handle the waterslide and dunk tank. He also made sure to sanitize both items.

name: Whitney Rosario
text: Adam & Shannon are super great! Set up was quick & as promised. All of the kids are having a blast on this thing, even the adults. We will definitely rent again from them in the future.

name: Shanna Fanning
text: We rented one of the obstacle courses for my son’s 5th birthday. They delivered and set up the obstacle course for us, and then came back to pick it up. So easy! The kids had such a fun weekend and my son said it was the best birthday ever.

name: Ray Parker
text: Great company and products.  We have rented two times from them this year and both times have been a great experience.  Great customer service and very professional. We’re looking forward to the next time.  Thank you for helping us with the perfect pandemic birthday surprise for our daughter.

name: Karen Doles
text: We have been using Spacewalk of Montgomery for the past 9 years. Our kids LOVE the inflatable water slides! Best customer service- super friendly and fast to reply. My kids are always asking about the next time we can rent!

name: Karlynn Morales
text: AWESOME!!! Due to the current pandemic this was just the FUN my daughter needed. HUGE water slide in our own back yard for the weekend. Complete Privacy! The owners were very helpful and professional. Space Walk of Montgomery, YOU ARE THE BEST!!!

name: Tia Adams
text: We have been using Space Walk of Montgomery for about 7 years now, the previous owners were AWESOME. We rented a flat/water slide for my son's birthday and the new owners have went above and beyond to make his birthday one to remember. We will definitely be using them again in the future.

name: Andrea Ackerman
text: This company has great customer service. They were on time for setting up and taking it down. Very friendly and professional. We will definitely be renting from them again.

name: Candace Blowers
text: We had a blast for my daughters party! Great communication and products. Would definitely recommend and use again myself.

name: Megan Hoehn
text: Customer service is excellent. We were looking at a few companies for a weekend rental and I am glad we went with SpaceWalk Inflatables. The smiles on their faces was worth every penny!

name: Catherine Godbold
text: Always have fun on the inflatables and cant wait to rent again. I definitely suggest it for any function. Awesome people to work with.

name: Tamika Mckinnes
text: Everyone at space walk was very nice, Shannon answered all questions I had. Delivery and setup was great. We enjoyed a weekend of fun thanks to Space Walk of Montgomery.

name: Hallie Burton
text: We have used Space Walk of Montgomery for several years and wouldn't go anywhere else.   We always have a great experience with them and they have a great selection of slides for us to choose from.   I recommend them to everyone!!

name: Jessica Quinn
text: Great communication and delivery. The slide arrived early and my kids have loved every second of it. It is clean and the staff are very friendly.

name: Lindsay Berry
text: Great customer service! The kids had a blast! I highly recommend this place!

name: Ashley Crim- Smith
text:
HIGHLY recommend!!! We took advantage of the 3 day for 1 day rental promotion, which was PERRRFECT & they DEFINITELY didn't disappoint! We rented the Double Water-Slide & had a blast!!! They even provided tarps for the exits of the slide!!! It was worth every penny🤗
Their customer service is AMAZING! The gentlemen who came out& set up everything was super nice& very professional! He also answered questions (sent via text) when we had the slide! We'll definitely be renting from them again!!!

name: Suzy Williams
text: Super friendly and very affordable.

name: Shannon Nelson
text: Well worth the money.  Rented it for my granddaughters 7th birthday. We had a blast. Not sure who had more fun. Kids or adults.  Great fun. 🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗

name: Brooke Devers
text: I would recommend Spacewalk Montgomery to everyone. They were easy to work with and according to my kids made yesterday the best birthday party and play day ever!

name: Mrs. Pam McLemore MCS

name: jaylen4money
text: I rented the 24ft Waterfall Water Slide for my daughter's birthday it was a 3 day special. My family and I enjoyed it and will recommend everyone try it out and you will enjoy it too. I would like to thank Space Walk of Montgomery for making my daughter's first birthday party a blast.🎉🎊🥳😍😍

name: Fredda Jones
text: Awesome customer service. The grown ups enjoyed themselves more than the kids. Thanks for everything and we will rent from Space Walk again.

name: Manager
text: The owners are very friendly and courteous. They answered all my questions when I spoke with them and helped me find exactly what I was looking for. Everyone had a blast at our party. We will definitely use them again!!

name: The Allen's
text: Space Walk of Montgomery is amazing! We rented one of their water slides this weekend, and had the best time for an amazing price!!!! Will definitely rent from again very soon!!!!

name: Phyllis Edwards
text: The BEST customer service with the best inflatables. They have so many to pick from. Their slogan “Here Comes Fun” is exactly what it is. Thank u Space Walk Of Montgomery for the all that fun. Can’t wait for next time.❤️

name: Lisa Lang
text: We LOVED it!! The kids had a blast,  even the big kids!! I will DEFINITELY be using them many more times in the future!!!

name: Shelli Carroll

name: Haley Roberson

The fact that they do contactless delivery and pick up makes it even better between my busy work schedule I didn’t have to make sure someone was there to watch for them.

name: Ashley P
text: Professional and friendly. Answered all emails and calls in a timely manner. Spacewalk of Montgomery net all my needs for my daughter party. Will definitely book again in the near future.

name: Vanessa Wineberg
text: We use Spacewalk every year for our 4th of July celebration! Delivery is fast, efficient and professional. The staff is very friendly and always willing to make our event a success.

name: Geva Clyde
text: Great service! Good quality my daughter had a blast and very good prices! Over all the customer service was great can’t wait to get from them again!

name: Warren Mitchell
text: I’ve rented from them for years and we just got another one this weekend and when they delivered it they spent a good bit of time sanitizing it to help make sure the kids were safe from Covid.  Highly recommend them!

name: Angelica Lampkin

name: Crystal Rhodes
text: Rented the biggest slide for 3 days and everyone had a great time! We had the option to pick up ourselves which was a plus. We are definitely going to be renting from Space Walk again and possibly every year from now on! Very friendly staff!

And they delivered it hours before we needed it. The movie screen is also gigantic so if you’re ever looking to have a movie night or watch a big game, I recommend getting the screen!

name: David Robertson
text: This lady does a wonderful job. She is on the ball and works so fast and efficiently. The products are amazing and there are soo many to choose from. As far as I can tell she vets every product she offers and only carries the ones from reputable companies that really WORK like they're supposed to. And what's even better, she doesn't price gouge. I mean, the pain lotion she carries is 1000mg per ounce and the price is amazing. And, yes, it works!! It's outstanding. All of her offerings are. Thanks for all you do to increase our health! 5 stars for sure. 😁

resp.text: Yes we agree, the Lotion is superb!! Thanks for your feedback

Total game changer from this company! Can help with anxiety and restlessness everytime! Will recommend to everyone I know!

resp.text: Thank you Trenten I’m happy we could help!!!

text: Dealing with Canna Bliss couldn't be any easier. Support is fantastic, products are top quality and never any issues with them, delivery and/or drop off of products always on time. Excellent representatives, highly recommend!

text: We are very pleased with the accuracy and speed of our deliveries.  The products are exactly what is expected.  Thanks for the opportunity to share this review with others.

name: Margot Marstrell
text: Best CIF I have experienced in my 14 years.  They are always friendly, welcoming, and helpful!

name: Devon Greer
text: Throughout a half dozen permanent bases and numerous short term visits to bases, this was by far the most efficient and swift CIF experience I've had. They always greeted me cheerfully. They would get 5 stars, but the computer systems were down twice, requiring three trips to actually pick up my issue items. However, they pulled my file and had everything waiting for me when I returned on the third trip, making it less than 20 minutes for a full issue, check out, and inspection. Overall a good experience and with less nagging and haggling than I'm used to with CIF facilities.

name: Richard Callahan
text: Best CIF in the Army

name: Laureen Johnson
text: Very welcoming! Clean and spotless too.

name: Matthew Jones
text: I didn't actually go here recently but c'mon. One star for a CIF is a no-brainer. Who had ever went to CIF and came out saying "man, that was a great experience. I can't wait to go back"? No one ever has or ever will.

name: Sherrie Campbell
text: Found a lot of really good sales when I went. My niece was spending her birthday money. Some really nice items and outfits to choose from. She bought a really cute outfit. She's a size 2. Her mom bought her some shoes from there that she liked as well.  The cashier was pleasant.

name: Ultreya Park
text:
Great deals again today, $5 espadrilles and a red rain jacket. So busy, no time for them to keep up w/picking up. LOTS of variety here. Friendly staff.

Few months ago, extra 50% off clearance and a lot to choose from. Picked up a jean jacket @ $9.50, sunglasses @ $5.53, gorgeous-blue cabbie hat @ $3.50, black wrap-type sweater-shrug, a crop sweatshirt, both @ $4.50, and for $2.50 each, a bright pink crossbody bag in shiny dark pink, and black flat dressy shoes that were not marked clearance, expected to pay $17.90! The manager was super-friendly, made sure we knew about the sale, offered help. The store was cleaner and more organized than sometimes. Ran out of time or I am sure I would have found more.

name: Reema Eqab
text: !!Completely disorganized and terrible service!! The customer service at this location was the worst I've see in a long time. Most of the employees were on their phones. When I went to the dressing room, the girl, without looking up from her phone, said "go ahead"  I was hesitant because she didn't ask to count my clothes. When I left the dressing room, I asked her where she wanted me to put my clothes, and she didn't answer. Then I said "do you want them here?" and she says, "put them over there." And as soon as I left, I heard her do a long attitude exhale. There was no organization in the clothes either, the shirts and pants were literally mixed around everywhere on all the racks. The jewelry section wasn't any better, the necklaces were all tangled together. We don't have a forever 21 in my location, so I decided to come here, but I don't think I'll waste my time next time. I'll just go to the Destin location.

name: Haleigh Lynch
text: I used to love this location but just recently walked out empty handed because the line was from the register and about 20 customers long which I would have been happy to wait in because I understood on Fridays at around 5 pm is a busy time what I did not understand was the multiple employees on two registers playing and about 5 employees near the exit that went to the parking lot walking in and out playing with the security sensors on their name badges. I understand not everyone is comfortable with working on a register and understand when there's down time to have fun but when a line is almost to the mall entrance? No thanks, I will take my business to Rue 21 and go to Panama City Beach  in Florida and shop at that Forever 21 location to get better customer service!

name: Snapple K
text: Love their options & prices. Friendly staff, most of the time. Too much crowded clothing racks. No organization at all.

text: This Store is great. Has gotten a little pricey since they first opened but overall nice clothes

name: An E
text: This store definitely has the worst customer service in the mall hands-down. I went to the dressing room today and the two girls were on their phone both times I went. I tried to hand her t-shirt and she didn’t notice at first and when she did, she snatched it out of my hands. The cashier shoved the bag in my hand and immediately turned back to continue talking with her coworker while I was checking out. This wasn’t the first time I have had horrible customer service here and it is very disappointing.

name: Amy Le
text: Have shopped here since 2001. Last year I order almost $400 worth of clothes. Wanted to add it as little extra mini side gifts for my sisters. Never received it. Called them, and they gave me go in circles calling FedEx and what not. 6 months later still didn't get a final result. Never got my refund, emailed them, never received a reply, called them again, was told the same thing, 5-10 business days for the refund to go through. Still nothing. And it's almost Christmas and everytime it gets close to November, I'm just so upset about it. I didn't call my bank bc I thought they were going to fix the issue. Just so disappointed. Haven't shopped there since. I normally order my stuff online because I don't like going into the stores, very messy and unorganized. And after this incident, just really don't want to work with people like that.

name: Elisha Bagley
text:
I needed a car after I had a wreck and my vehicle got totaled, I didn’t have a ton of money, I looked high and low and found Sabino Motors! I got a car with Low miles, clean inside and out, new tires, good brakes, oil change, something dependable for me and my kids! SABINO motors is a hidden treasure for sure! Ray does an amazing job and enjoys what he does, and it shows in the vehicles he restores and the great deals he makes, he cares about you as a person and your safety as you leave with one of his cars!
Him and his wife are truly a blessing and I would recommend them to any and everyone one!

resp.text: THANK So much MRS BAGLEY

name: Lana Smothers
text:
If you’re looking for an affordable car this is the place to look! Ray and his wife are very helpful and they will work with your budget to find you a good, dependable car at your price point.   Trust me on that...I push him to stay within my budget every time! ;)
We will be back....already bought from him 3 times and he's on the search for my next ride as we speak.  Can't speak highly enough about this little known jewel of a used car lot!

name: Jeremy D
text: How could you rate them with anything less than 5 stars? ... it’s impossible! They are above and beyond... amazing! They are what dealerships used to be... honest, hardworking, and genuine! I will definitely call them before I get another vehicle elsewhere. Already told 50 people about them today!

resp.text: Thanks Jeremy we hope you enjoy you new cargo van. And go successful in. Your new projects on life  keep us on mind.  For future vehicles.

name: Karen Bowie

The owner Destany was so welcoming and genuine! I would definitely recommend stopping by and chatting. Did I mention she gift wraps!? One stop shop for any guy looking for something to get his wife a great gift  and there's even a little men's section with beard oils and pomade so this place is definitely for everyone!

I recommend this business to anyone who wants to get the best hair care.

text: I went to Tam for the first time for a deep conditioning, trim, and silk press. Tam is professional, kind, and knowledgeable. She definitely taught me a few things about caring for my hair! She was right on time and got me in and out pretty quick. I will definitely be back and be recommending her to my natural friends!

text: I'm someone who is very particular about who touches my hair. Tam did an amazing job! She used her own products (which smelled amazing) and gave me the silkiest silk press I've ever seen. Not only that, but she is really nice and super professional. No waiting around hours for her to start, and her time estimates per service are very accurate. I'd recommend Tam to any and everyone!

text: My V-Steam experience was awesome. Not only was the experience serene and relaxing but it was also educational as well. Tamara and her staff make sure you understand the process, answer any and all questions and they make sure you are comfortable throughout the entire experience.  They make sure you feel pampered. V-Steam is wonderful for the health of your “V” and I would recommend that  EVERY WOMAN at least try it. You will not regret it!!!

name: A Vines
text: Tamara was highly recommended by a friend for her knowledge of how to “care for” damaged hair and revive it to health again. Upon my initial “consultation” visit with my two daughters, we were greeted professionally and welcomed to a warm and inviting salon. Tamara immediately assessed our hair, diagnosed our situation & gave us written prescriptions to take home to care for our hair. She did not attempt to keep secrets to get us to come back. Her honesty and professionalism turned our “consultation” visit into an appointment for all three of us. Tamara’s team immediately went to work. They continued to assess, diagnosis, treat our hair and scalp, and prescribe solutions to revive our hair. Tamara’s passion is hair, healthy hair. She is committed to educating people of all ethnicities about how to care for their hair. And yes, Tamara’s knowledge and expertise crosses ethnic and racial barriers as she has client testimonials from all ethnicities and races. To say that my daughters and I highly recommended Tam’s Natural Solutions would be an understatement. Book your appointment today!

name: Melvin Johnson
text: Tams men products go hard.  Tams products have its own natural scents that us men love. Don’t smell like hair or other grooming products.  If you have waves in your hair you will love the sea sick. The products are great.  Ohhhhj can’t leave the ladies out you you know Tam got y’all. Go out check her out

name: Leah Fields
text: Tam is a cutting edge hair stylist who offers customized packages to suit her clients needs. She emphasizes maintaining or obtaining healthy hair by using the best products and exploring a variety of hairstyles to compliment her clients. If you have natural hair or wear protective hair styles, call her today to book your consultation because you will be extremely satisfied with her services. In addition, her staff provides exceptional customer service.

name: J Bolton
text:
The stylist, salon, and the products are wonderful. 4 out of 5 people in my household have drastically different hair types and the products work for all of us.

I love the Lather series of soap—especially the charcoal with the tea tree oil, the smell is so crisp. I like the lavender as well. I love the shampoo, conditioner, gel, and hair and scalp oil.

I love everything! I just had a mini haul last Saturday.

Also, you will not find a better stylist. Every time I get “out of the chair” it’s a new me!

In addition,the shop is always clean and bright. And, I’m never in the shop waiting longer than necessary (which is very important to me!)

I like that I can make appointments from my phone and the establishment takes credit and debit with the ability to add a tip.

Is there any more I can say? Check it out for yourself 💕💕💕.

name: Rhoda Francis
text: Can’t say more about this places and the ladies here. Tamara and Brenda are the absolute best at what they do. Always so welcoming and friendly — hair looks amazing! I come every week and have been for over a year now and I am so happy with my hair. It is always glowing. So healthy. Love them!! Thank you!

name: Angela Baker
text: I would like to thank Lagunza for introducing me to the Yoni steam, and full body  Detox. My daughter and I enjoyed our time together and it was such a pleasant experience, that we plan to come back monthly.Thank you Tam, for such a warm, friendly and professional environment, that was a plus. We welcome all natural products, thanks for educating us on your natural products, can't wait to try our soap.

text: This salon is amazing! Tamara cares about your the health of your hair while maintaining a fresh look. She specializes in natural hair care and knows different hair types. text:
Yesterday, I experienced my 2nd yoni steam at Tam's Natural Solution. My first steam was 2 weeks ago and I had no idea what to expect from the treatment. The customer service was amazing. Prior to my first appointment,  I had questions, so I messaged Tam and she got me in touch with Gunza. Gunza called me and chatted with me about the benefits of the steam and how it would assist me with personal health goals. At the time, I had heard about the benefits of the steam and thought I would try it.

My first appointment was amazing. Gunza and Tam greeted me with a smile and took me to a private place  to chat. It was a personal experience with a service that catered to your comfort. My second appointment was no different in terms of customer service. This time, I was provided a blend of herbs for my personal health need. I had a consultation with Tam and she told me more about the things that would be beneficial to me.

name: Lisa allen
text:
I made an appt for my mother and I.  Spoke extensively to Brenda explained we would come in 15 mins early to fill out paperwork.   Drove over an hour.   When we got there the place was locked up and no lights on.  When we talked to someone they said they gave our appts to someone else.....not sure how that's possible when we were there and there were no cars in parking lot and lights were off.  Looks like they decided to take day off instead of keeping appointment that was scheduled for days.  Horrible customer service and really put us out of our way...3 hours round trip driving w no apology.

In regards to your response that is not true at all.  When I talked to someone on the phone they said they gave our appts to someone else and we could come back at 6:00.

I also explained when I made the appt I could not go online because I did not have service I was traveling.  Which is why we agreed that we would come in early.

The fact that you are saying we didnt show up is an out right lie.

resp.text: We so sorry you had a bad experience.  We pride ourselves with customers service.   We requested that you make online appointment, but we made special accommodations for your appointment.   In preparation for your appointment for  today we arrived early and no one was here.  We even checked the cameras, there must be a miscommunication.   Please email us so that we can resolve this!

name: Erica Braswell
text:
I bought a new washer & dryer set from Handy's yesterday. The sales person was very polite, very professional, wasn't pushy at all but informative (which to me is very important). Prices were great as well.
The delivery guys showed up today, Jim & James. Both were incredibly nice, very professional & knowledgeable. They worked hard to install both appliances. My laundry space is very small & it was a bit difficult to maneuver but they did so without complaint at all.
I would definitely recommend Handy TV for any needs & I plan to use them for anything I may need in the future as well. James & Jim went above & beyond expectations. An overall amazing experience on all fronts!

resp.text: Hi Erica!  Thanks so much for shopping at Handy TV-Appliance! We are delighted to hear that you had such great experiences, both in the store and with your delivery!   I will pass along your compliments to Jim and James.  Please don't hesitate to ask if there is anything we can do for you in the future.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!
