name: Rikesh Patel
text:
Previous review is a fake review probably one of her family members. She is not nice at all, past 6 years of many business given to her and not once a thank you. Jenny is very rude and uncooperative.

Gave Jenny $2,000 worth of business last week and she got paid the full amount. Upon paying she informed don't come here again. I asked for what as I have been going to her since the past 6 years with thousands of dollars given to her.
-I even explained to her "I AM ASIAN TOO why are you doing this to me when I have always paid (in large sums)"?

She has lost a large chunk of business by telling me not to come. I thought she was joking when she told me when I came to pick up the material.

In normal fashion I came following week and she said, "no work for you". She refused to do my personal clothes. Still confused on why considering I gave her $2,000 the previous week I was bewildered.

I suggest going to Birmingham or using someone else in town. This lady demands cash, refused to fill out a W9 form to evade taxes, and she runs a shady operation in which the Federal government needs to do an audit on her.
-She doesn't report any taxes and clearly told me that information last week when she refused to accept a verified business check. Her response, "NO NO NO only cash I no pay tax"

resp.text:
Hello Mr. Patel,
This is Jenny. ( I have someone write this on my behalf, as you know my English is not very good.)

I appreciate your business over the years, however as a small private business owner, I have the rights to refuse service. I have been very cordial and welcoming to you over the years, however if my actions somehow displayed otherwise, I sincerely apologize. I valued all my customers. To clear the misunderstanding as to why I no longer wish to provide service I'll provide the reasons why.

Upon the transaction exchange, you demanded that I fill out a W-9 for you. Since I have never filled one out and the document was foreign to me I objected because I had no idea what it was (it was against my better judgment to sign any documents that I don't understand). I asked you to speak to my daughter on the telephone to explain it to her so she can translate it back to me and I later realized I had to provide one.

This exchange was not a pleasant one for both parties. I apologize that I am not fluent in English and therefore misunderstood you when you try to explain the W-9 form to me.

However, you fail to mentioned in your reviews how you treated me during the exchange which is why I asked you to not bring me your service again. I felt your actions towards me was very hostile and threatening. text:
Rented a trailer to pick up a 3500# tractor.  On the way back, one of the tires came apart.  I pulled into a gas station and called them.  I was told they had no spare tires and I needed to pull the trailer back on three tires.  I cut off the loose part and limped it back across town driving no faster than 25mph.

When I arrived at the center, I explained what happened at the front desk.  I was told tires are the renters responsibilities.  The guy on the phone implied differently.  Normally, I would agree, but the tire in question was clearly dry rotted along with the others.  The guy at the front desk told me previous renters could have put bad tires on?  Prior to me leaving, they made sure the tires were fully inflated.  I suspect they knew the tires were questionable in the first place.  When I called him out on the dry rot, he started back pedaling.  He agreed not to charge me.

I like Alabama Rental normally, but this experience clearly was questionable.

name: Have Thread Will Travel
text: Long story short, after many doctor's appointments I was diagnosed with fibromyalgia and put on meds that made me gain a bunch of weight and masked the pain.  I was told that my condition would always be just a matter of managing the symptoms and that I could either treat it with opioids (no thanks) or anti depressants.  After about a year of feeling like a zombie, gaining a bunch of weight, and overall still being exhausted and in pain (just not caring due to the meds) I decided that was not a lifestyle I was willing to continue with.  I stopped by the cbd store just to chat about my options. The staff was very warm and welcoming and answered all of my questions without making me feel pushed into buying something.  Margo recommended I try CBG oil for both my pain and energy issues.  I'm now completely off all my prescription meds and am doing much better than I had been on them.  I've learned to manage my pain and energy in a much more effective way that doesn't mess with my weight or personality.  Every time I stop in they are super friendly and the store is very clean and welcoming.  I love that they are always willing to check up on me and make sure that the products I use are still working for me. If you're unsure about any of these topics I definently recommend stopping by and chatting with them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your story and giving us a review.  As we always say in the store, we are not just a place to buy CBD but a place to gain education and have support after adding this wonderful plant to your daily diet.  What a difference it has made for you!  We also appreciate you bringing in your family, thank you for trusting us to take good care of them.  We will see you guys soon!

After discussing the encounter with our vet tech earning her certification on this very subject, and showing her the product, she found that oil was so weak that one bottle was only 2 doses for our sized dog.  She recommended we go to Your CBD Store.  I found Margo very knowledgeable about her products for pets.  I came prepared with questions from the vet tech, and Margo was either able to answer them or knew where to find the answer within minutes.  In addition, Margo was very pleasant and not once did she make me feel like I was an imposition by asking questions in this new area we were exploring.  Thank you, Margo.  You set a great example of great customer service...and products.  Within about a week, our dog was acting like she did pre-arthritis.  I highly recommend Your CBD Store!

name: Ashley Bowman
text:
I have been into this store twice now and the customer service is top notch. I can’t say enough about the friendliness of Mrs Margo!!! Now if you are are on the fence about trying the CBD products, here’s my suggestion for you: DO IT!!! My husband and I have decided to try it out over the last week and a half or so, and there have been MAJOR differences!!!!

My personal testimony for the CBD products: I have synthetic cartilage, a medal plate and six screws that sit across the orbital bone in the right side of my face. You can imagine the pain it causes. My first time in to check out the store and the products, I explained to Mrs Margo about the metal and screws, she allowed me to sample a pain cream they have, for several hours that day I was COMPLETELY PAIN FREE!!! For the first time in over 3 years!!!! I bought a bottle of the Water Soluble CBD oil, and took it home to try. As I have used the product I have began to notice that the pain in my face is more manageable, my anxiety hasn’t been nearly as high. Due to other medical issues, there are certain days where pain would keep me from doing ANYTHING AT ALL. It would hurt to breathe or even roll over in bed. Since using this product, I have notice the pain is more manageable, and on days that I would normally just lay in bed and try to lay completely still, I am getting up and doing things like baking cupcakes and making icing from scratch!!! I am a true believer in this product now!!! Give it and Mrs Margo at Your CBD Store in Enterprise a shot! See what it can do for you!!!

resp.text: Hi Ashley. Thank you for taking your time to share your experience with others! We are so grateful to each customer who places their trust in us at Your CBD Store. text: First, the customer service is AMAZING! The shop is super clean, organized and inviting. She will answer every question you have, and she's very knowledgeable. I purchased the CBD Vape pen. I used to have one or two migraines a week that would just cripple me. I have not had one headache since vaping the CBD (this alone has me sold). I also battle with slight insomnia and I have been going to bed at a reasonable time, and sleeping sooo good at night and not feeling groggy in the morning. I have found Your CBD store to fill this important role.   You are sure to enjoy the TLC of this lovely family of sisters that are in business together, one of which is the Enterprise, AL location.  Larry Koval, O.D.

name: Gannon Slusser
text:
I went to Bridge Street to see a movie with my girlfriend at Monaco Pictures. We arrived a couple of hours before our showtime, so like anyone else would have done, we decided to take a look around and see what some of the stores had to offer.

I saw the Un Voyage Plain in the store window as we were walking by. I was in the market for a pair of comfortable shoes to wear to an upcoming event that requires all attendees to adhere to a business casual dress code. I don't often go to these types of events, so I didn't really know what I wanted, but I was immediately drawn to this shoe when I saw it in the store window.

I went in to take a closer look and was greeted by an associate named LeeAnn. She was extremely knowledgeable with a keen eye for detail. She asked me when I had had my feet measured last, and honestly I couldn't remember ever having my feet measured.

After taking my measurements, she recommended going with a half size higher than I usually buy and using insoles to take up some of the extra space since one of my feet is a half size bigger than the other. I took her advice, and I have never been more comfortable in a pair of formal shoes.

Overall the experience was great, and I will be a regular customer going forward. In fact, I received a coupon during this visit that I plan on using to purchase another pair of Voyages in black.

Hi Lois,

Thank you for your feedback. Our retail customer support team is working  really hard to make sure that every customer leaves with the best experience possible.
We would like to make it up to you if you can please reach us by email and reference case # 10168740. Our email is : RetailCustServSupport@Clarks.com . Let us know if you have any questions or concerns.

If you would like to speak to our customer service line who handles a wider array of issues, please call 1-800-211-5461 or email consumerservices@clarks.com .

Kevin

text: Ive shopped here several times in the past with no problems. In the past few weeks I was looking to buy a replacement pair of loafers I love. They didn't have them in the store or online so I bought two pair that I thought would do online. Once I got them in I decided I needed the exact design I had and found them on another website. I decided to just take them back instead of using the free shipping label. The guy that was working was almost fairly rude and spent about 5 minutes inspecting the shoes (I received them the day before, I didn't even try them on). Then he proceeds to tell me that I need the email confirmation and the enclosed clarks receipt wasn't enough. I looked at him and stated that the piece of paper I gave him states thats all I need for a refund and I hope its not going to be a problem since the order number and barcode was on the shipping receipt. He then backs up and says "Oh, well do you know which card you used because this doesn't say!" I handed him my card and he finally finished it up. I know on slow days returns probably arent wanted, but don't make people feel they don't have enough to do a return.

text:
I called today which is May 23, 2018 three times become leaving my home. Online it stated that this company  does not close until 7pm. Once, I arrived there was a young male on the computer and what's that next to him the phone. I stated what I was looking for he believed she is out of it (wow, four different products). He did get up once since he saw that I know where some of the products usually are. Yes, I  found two of the products in full supply, but what I was really needing was behind the counter.  The young man said she just cut it I guess she will wrap it tomorrow. I asked will you check to see if she will just wrap me at least one piece today. Young
Male stated she will do it tomorrow....

Wow, for this to be a local own company. It has the worst customer service.... I'll just continue to order from Destin. Florida.

resp.text: I'm sorry for the trouble.  The Lavender Detox behind the counter isnt ready to wrap, yet. It needs to cure before being put on the shelf. I will happily comp you a bar of the Lavender Detox if you'll give us another go. - Soapy Jones, Head Monger.

name: James Lawley
text:
Awesome place I purchased over 100 t-shirts today.
Make sure you check the shirts before you buy they do have alot with beauty marks and tiny holes.
If using for a business (sublimation) check well but if using for general use grab them all very cheap and very huge selection.
I highly recommend.

name: Kelli Burdette
text: This company and staff are the epitome of old school prime customer service.  They will BEND OVER BACKWARDS to accommodate your every need and I do NOT exaggerate!!  Professional and loyal to a fault. "Good People" who truly care and want help.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

resp.text: Kelli, thank you for your review and your business! We strive to give our customers top notch products and service!

name: Miranda McGregor
text: Absolutely the best place for linens and paper products!  Staff is exceptional at taking care of their customers and providing the best customer service of any supplier on the beach!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  Our goal is to make it easier for you to do business!

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We aim to please!

resp.text: Thank you Chuck! We strive to make it easy and simple! Let us know if you need anything else!

name: ffalan57
text: I grew up going to this camp when I was in the Boy Scouts and then was on Camp Staff several summers. The Trading Post is an integral part of this mountain camp and was the result of a lot love, sweat and tears from Moran Colburn. He was a friend, mentor and leader! I still have a pair of my moccasins that Moran showed me how to make for our OA dance team.

name: Michael Goff
